Absolutely, starting small with community-level initiatives like clean-up events, recycling drives, and promoting awareness about the impact of pollution can make a big difference. It's important to remember that everyone can contribute to reducing pollution and protecting the environment, and individual actions can have a cumulative impact.

In addition, you can also support local businesses or companies that have a demonstrated commitment to sustainability and reducing their impact on the environment. This could involve buying environmentally-friendly products or recycling as much as possible.

Overall, creating a culture of sustainability and environmental awareness is key to achieving a cleaner, healthier environment for present and future generations in Xiamen.
